item.title: [317] Adding Korasi [317]-[WORKING]
item.dc:creator: @colossusx7 colossusx7
item.description:
@colossusx7 wrote:

[quote=“AnxietyX, post:1, topic:388265”]Adding KORASI!

First-Download the models. link below:
http://up.ht/dL4hIv
Extract it to the client model folder.

Add this to ur client`s class8.java

if(i == ****){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.aString170 = "Korasi`s sword"; class8.aByteArray178 = "The sword of a Void Knight.".getBytes(); class8.anInt174 = 57784; class8.anInt181 = 700; class8.anInt190 = 60; class8.anInt198 = 1400; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -25; class8.anInt194 = -60; class8.anInt165 = 57780; class8.anInt200 = 57784; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; }

The main things you should know:

if(i == ****) Basically means what the ID of your item will be in-game

class8.anInt165 = 57780; : The male wearing model ID
class8.anInt200 = 57784; : The female wearing model ID

class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”; : Adds a new option to the items menu

now go to the server files, and to the item.cfg (commonly found in the config folder), add this line:

They are all the stats, you can change these as you wish.

Now, for the Special.

Go To Client.java in your server files and search:

then u should see something like this:

if((id == 1215 || id == 1231 || id == 5680 || id == 5698 || id == 1205) && FightType != 3) // dragon daggers { return 402;

Right under that code add:

if(id == 57784) // korasi { return 12309;

That means if you are attacking using korasi`s,
you will use the emote 12309.

Next search this:

You should see something like this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) { return 403;

Right under that code add this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 57784) { return 12309;
[b]That’s basically saying the same thing as before, lol.

Next, search this:[/b]

You should see sometime like this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 50){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 0x426); getHit(8); usingSpecial = true;

Right under that add:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 57784 && specialAmount > 50){ specialAtk(true, 1872, 1224); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(2); usingSpecial = true; }

[b]This is saying how much of the special bar it uses, how many times it hits and the emote ID.

Next, search this:
[/b]

you should see something like this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 50){ specialAtkNPC(true, 25, 252, 0x426); npcDamage(8); }

[b]This is saying the same thing as before but on NPC’s,

Under that add:[/b]

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 57784 && specialAmount > 50){ specialAtkNPC(true, 1872, 0x426); npcDamage(16); }

Now, search this:

Under that add

public boolean DCDamg = false; public int DCdown = 0;Now search:

if ((IsAttackingNPC) && DCDamg == true ) { if (DCdown == 2 ) { startAnimation(1872); } SpecDamgNPC(30); DCdown -= 1; if (DCdown == 0 ) { DCDamg = false; } } if (IsAttacking == true && DCDamg == true ) { if (DCdown == 2 ) { startAnimation(1872); } SpecDamg(25); DCdown -= 1; if (DCdown == 0 ) { DCDamg = false; } }

and then u got KORASI!!! ;D

credits:
99% to me for getting all codes and all that.( i finished the models )
1% to Maikie for starting on models

DONT LEECH OR FLAME CUZ:
i made the whole model beside the the little diamond on the weapond.
and i dident copy any1.

  • i bet there is like 5 korasi adding tuts…(and i dident find 1)(i just got help with the model)
    the picture isent the model…its just a picture of how the korasi looks like

need any help? add my msn: marius_johan96@hotmail.com
Thank you…
[/quote]

case ****: class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.aString170 = "Korasi's sword"; class8.aByteArray178 = "The sword of a Void Knight.".getBytes(); class8.anInt174 = 57784; class8.anInt181 = 700; class8.anInt190 = 60; class8.anInt198 = 1400; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -25; class8.anInt194 = -60; class8.anInt165 = 57780; class8.anInt200 = 57784; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; break;

Had to do it
[it was making me twitch]

JK

Read full topic

item.description:
@C_Imbued wrote:

[quote=“Tobbescape, post:44, topic:388265”][quote author=AnxietyX link=topic=484089.msg3597807#msg3597807 date=1305302736]

i have this in my itemdef2, but i dont know what to change because your is class8 something

case ####:
itemDef.name = “Name”;
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[0] = “Drink”;
itemDef.originalModelColors = new int[1];
itemDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[1];
itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 61;
itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 0;
itemDef.modelID = 2621;
itemDef.modelZoom = 550;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 84;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 1996;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0;
itemDef.description = “Description.”.getBytes();
break;

i did what you told me but when i spawn my item it just crashes the client…

case 18786:
itemDef.name = “Korasi’s sword”;
itemDef.description = “The sword of a Void Knight.”.getBytes();
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wield”;
itemDef.modelID = 57780;
itemDef.maleEquip1 = 57780;
itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 57784;
itemDef.modelZoom = 1513;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 525;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 40;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 4;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = -3;
break;
;D ;D
[/quote]ItemDef_2.java:131: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable actions
location: class ItemDef

^
ItemDef_2.java:132: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable actions
location: class ItemDef
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wield”;
^

^

symbol : variable modelRotation2
location: class ItemDef
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 40;
^
Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
6 errors
Trykk en tast for å fortsette…[/quote]
